title: [Self-Directed] Developmental UbD-Based Secondary Mathematics Achievement Simulation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts (Equations, Functions, Geometry) and Basic Awareness of Secondary Education Curriculum
context.additional_context: A secondary mathematics relearning program for adult learners, implementing instructional design that recreates actual classroom environments through VR simulation and applies developmental-stage learning strategies.

learning_goals: Analyze UbD (Understanding by Design) lesson design principles and explain their impact on secondary mathematics achievement
Solve math problems based on developmental approaches in VR simulations, improving concept application skills by over 80%
Quantitatively analyze the effectiveness of UbD-based teaching methods through pre-post achievement comparisons

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
